property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you suffer Hits during a Boarding Attack. You may tack or sink crew other than your crew in the Boarding Attack to absorb Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target another Ship. Move that Ship to a Sea adjacent to its current Sea. Inflict 1 Hit on that Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. React: Play this card instead of conducting a Boarding Attack. Sink one of your untacked crew, except Captain. Your next Boarding Attack in this Boarding inflicts 4 extra Hits.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sea Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal • Heroic • Swordsman +1 React: Tack one of you crew to untack Angus when your ship enters a Boarding that is not canceled. Angus may perform this reaction once per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal • Swordsman +2 When Babette's opponent in a Boarding Attack plays the final Boarding Attack card, tack Babette to reduce the Hits inflicted by the Boarding Attack to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play immediately before the other player in a Boarding pushes a crew forward. If all of your crew are tacked, the other player may choose to either end the Boarding, or allow you to untack 2 of your crew of your choosing.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play this card immediatly after you pay a cancel cost. Target the Ship controlled by the player who attempted the action. Inflict 1 Hit on that Ship. Only one Bad Luck may be played per action.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sea Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: When you are paying the cost to put a Control cards into play, Pete has +2 to all of his skills.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any player may pay the cancel cost. Target a Sea when you play this card. Until the end of the turn, each time a crew in the target Sea tacks to absorb Hits, discard the top card of your deck. If the Boarding Attack on the discard is a Club, sink that crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play before you push a crew forward for a Boarding Attack. Get a crew from your sunk pile and push that crew forward, untacked. If not already sunk, sink this crew when the Boarding ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you are tacking a crew to produce Cannon for a Cannon Attack. If the Ship targeted by the Cannon Attack has a crew maximum greater than 9, then your crew produces 3 extra Cannon.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Sea Attachment • Oath Enters play tacked. While it's Sea Attachment, it's Unique and your Captain's Skills are reduced by 1 (min. 1). If you complete an Artifact Adventure while it's untacked, it becomes a Captain Attachment. Your Captain gains +1 to all Skills.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sea Attachment Any player in this Sea may discard this card by discarding one of their crew as an action. Act: Name one skill and tack this card. All crew in this Sea have that skill reduced by 1 until the end of the turn (minimum 0, minimum 1 for Swashbuckling)

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play this card when you are producing Swashbuckling. Tack one of your crew to produce Swashbuckling equal to that crew's Adventuring plus Swashbuckling.

property.name: Text
property.value: La Boca Attachment • Port Any player in this Sea may sink Cannons of La Bucca by tacking 9 Cannon as an action. Act: Tack Cannons of la Bucca and target a Ship in this Sea. Inflict a 6 hit Cannon Attack on that Ship.

property.value: Target all Laerdom cards in play. Tack those cards.

property.value: React: Play immediately before you push a crew forward for a Boarding Attack. Discard all cards in play which were used instead of performing a Boarding Attack.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Target one of your Heroic crew, and one untacked crew with two or more attachments (except a Captain) on another ship. Draw 1 card. Play a card from your hand as a Boarding Attack to begin a Duel between the two crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only play this card if all of your crew are tacked. React: Play this card and discard one crew card from your hand when suffering Hits. Reduce the Hits suffered to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponent's Ship Attachment • Unique Play only if you have a Heroic Captain. Name a Sea when attaching it. It counts as 2 crew in the Ship it is attached to. The Captain of that Ship gains +1 Influence while this card is attached. Sink it when that Ship enters the named Sea.

property.name: Text
property.value: For the remainder of the turn, other players may not perform actions which react to your Ship entering their Sea.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only play this card if you have a Villainous Captain. Get up to 2 Illegal adventures from your deck, show them to your opponents, and place them in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your crew, except your Captain, gains +1 Swashbuckling and loses 1 from each of their other four skills (minimum 0) until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you are discarding or sinking a Cheap Attachment. The Cheap Attachment remains attached.
